a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of one-year-olds who have received different vaccinations,
Estimated number of one-year-olds who have received vaccinations for different diseases. This includes diphtheria,
pertussis and tetanus (DTP), measles, hepatitis B3, polio, Haemophilus influenzae b (Hib3), rubella, and rotavirus.
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); WHO & UNICEF (2024)
